issue.title: [CF 583] Not working since 5.0.4
issue.body:
Love this addon.. but since 5.0.4 none of my icons work - spell cooldown, etc.  Was there something I needed to do?  I thought that the issue was with my previous settings - and so I created a new group and placed only one icon on it with a spell cooldown for Bestial Wrath.  If I try this - even out of combat - nothing is triggered.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

I expect the behaviour I have had in the past -  currently nothing works - the icons display, but they don't hide on cooldowns, on reaction, etc.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

v6.0.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?

No.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

Example from my "test" icon - no conditions.

^1^T^SType^Scooldown ^SName^S19574;~`Bestial~`Wrath ^SManaCheck^B ^SRangeCheck^B ^SEnabled^B ^t^N60206^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user WarHopper | Imported from CurseForge issue #583 | Raw
